author: zach-folwick
body:
#561 covered one aspect: C-l.  C-a should default to highlighting the whole user input text.

C-a - highlight text
C-s - forward-i-search
C-r - backward-i-search
C-j - add new line and ">>>" to the prompt (Shift+enter should do the same)

Others? 

This should cover just about everything required to allow emacs or vi mode in PSL work the way it does in Winddows.
